mapper.select:
SELECT BASE_YM , SELL_TP_CD , SELL_TP_DTL_CD , SUM(AGRG_CT1) AS AGRG_CT1 , SUM(AGRG_CT2) AS AGRG_CT2 , SUM(AGRG_CT3) AS AGRG_CT3 , SUM(AGRG_CT4) AS AGRG_CT4 , SUM(AGRG_CT5) AS AGRG_CT5 , SUM(AGRG_CT6) AS AGRG_CT6 FROM (SELECT BASE_YM , SELL_TP_CD , SELL_TP_DTL_CD , PD_HCLSF_ID , PD_MCLSF_ID , PD_CD , PD_NM , AGRG_CT1 , AGRG_CT2 , AGRG_CT3 , AGRG_CT4 , (AGRG_CT2 - AGRG_CT3 - AGRG_CT4 ) AS AGRG_CT5 /*순증*/ , (AGRG_CT1 + (AGRG_CT2 - AGRG_CT3 - AGRG_CT4 )) AS AGRG_CT6 /*합계*/ FROM ( SELECT S1.BASE_YM , S1.SELL_TP_CD , S1.SELL_TP_DTL_CD , S1.PD_HCLSF_ID , S1.PD_MCLSF_ID , S1.PD_CD , S1.PD_NM , (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL WHERE CNTR_DTL_STAT_CD = '101' AND SUBSTR(CNTR_PD_STRTDT,1,6) < S1.BASE_YM AND SELL_TP_CD = S1.SELL_TP_CD AND SELL_TP_DTL_CD = S1.SELL_TP_DTL_CD AND BASE_PD_CD = S1.PD_CD ) AS AGRG_CT1 /*이월*/ , SUM(S1.AGRG_CT2) AS AGRG_CT2 /*유입*/ , SUM(S1.AGRG_CT3) AS AGRG_CT3 /*해지*/ , SUM(S1.AGRG_CT4) AS AGRG_CT4 /*만료*/ FROM ( SELECT SUBSTR(T1.CH_DTM, 0, 6) AS BASE_YM /*기준년월*/ , T1.SELL_TP_CD /*판매유형*/ , T1.SELL_TP_DTL_CD /*판매유형상세*/ , T1.PD_HCLSF_ID /*상품대분류*/ , T1.PD_MCLSF_ID /*상품중분류*/ , T1.BASE_PD_CD AS PD_CD /*상품코드 - 테이블추가필요*/ , (SELECT PD_NM FROM TB_PDBS_PD_BAS WHERE PD_CD = T1.BASE_PD_CD) AS PD_NM /*상품명*/ /*이월은 따로조회 */ , (CASE WHEN SUBSTR(T1.CNTR_PD_STRTDT,1,6) = SUBSTR(T1.CH_DTM, 1, 6) AND T1.CNTR_DTL_STAT_CD = '101' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS AGRG_CT2 /*유입*/ , (CASE WHEN T1.CNTR_DTL_STAT_CD IN ('301','302','303') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS AGRG_CT3 /*해지*/ , (CASE WHEN T1.CNTR_DTL_STAT_CD IN ('401','402') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS AGRG_CT4 /*만료*/ /*순증, 합계따로계산*/ FROM TB_CBCL_WELLS_CNTR_STAT_CH_BAS T1 /*WELLS계약상태변경기본 - 현재 유효분을 다들고 오려면 계약상세를 들고오는게 맞을꺼 같은데..일단은이렇게*/ WHERE CNTR_NO NOT IN (SELECT CNTR_NO FROM TB_CBCL_WELLS_NOM_ACC_EXCD_BAS WHERE CNTR_NO IS NOT NULL) AND BASE_PD_CD NOT IN (SELECT PD_CD FROM TB_CBCL_WELLS_NOM_ACC_EXCD_BAS WHERE PD_CD IS NOT NULL) AND T1.REL_SN = 1 AND SUBSTR(T1.CH_DTM, 0, 6) BETWEEN #{baseYmFrom} AND #{baseYmTo} AND CNTR_NO NOT IN (SELECT CNTR_NO FROM TB_CBCL_WELLS_NOM_ACC_EXCD_BAS WHERE CNTR_NO IS NOT NULL ) AND BASE_PD_CD NOT IN (SELECT PD_CD FROM TB_CBCL_WELLS_NOM_ACC_EXCD_BAS WHERE PD_CD IS NOT NULL) AND SELL_TP_CD IN ('2','3','6') /*판매유형*/
AND T1.SELL_TP_CD = #{sellTpCd} /*판매유형*/
AND T1.SELL_TP_DTL_CD = #{sellTpDtlCd} /*판매유형상세*/
AND T1.OG_TP_CD = #{ogTpCd} /*소속조직코드*/
AND T1.PD_HCLSF_ID = #{prdtCateHigh} /*상품대분류*/
AND T1.PD_MCLSF_ID = #{prdtCateMid} /*상품중분류*/
) S1 GROUP BY BASE_YM , SELL_TP_CD , SELL_TP_DTL_CD , PD_HCLSF_ID , PD_MCLSF_ID , PD_CD , PD_NM ) ) GROUP BY BASE_YM , SELL_TP_CD , SELL_TP_DTL_CD ORDER BY SELL_TP_CD, SELL_TP_DTL_CD

SELECT BASE_YM , SELL_TP_CD , SELL_TP_DTL_CD , (SELECT PD_CLSF_NM FROM TB_PDBS_PD_CLSF_BAS WHERE PD_CLSF_ID = PD_HCLSF_ID AND DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND USE_YN='Y') AS PD_HCLSF_ID /*상품대분류명)*/ , (SELECT PD_CLSF_NM FROM TB_PDBS_PD_CLSF_BAS WHERE PD_CLSF_ID = PD_MCLSF_ID AND DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND USE_YN='Y') AS PD_MCLSF_ID /*상품중분류명)*/ , PD_CD , PD_NM , AGRG_CT1 , AGRG_CT2 , AGRG_CT3 , AGRG_CT4 , (AGRG_CT2 - AGRG_CT3 - AGRG_CT4 ) AS AGRG_CT5 /*순증*/ , (AGRG_CT1 + (AGRG_CT2 - AGRG_CT3 - AGRG_CT4 )) AS AGRG_CT6 /*합계*/ FROM ( SELECT S1.BASE_YM , S1.SELL_TP_CD , S1.SELL_TP_DTL_CD , S1.PD_HCLSF_ID , S1.PD_MCLSF_ID , S1.PD_CD , S1.PD_NM , (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL WHERE CNTR_DTL_STAT_CD = '101' AND SUBSTR(CNTR_PD_STRTDT,1,6) < S1.BASE_YM AND SELL_TP_CD = S1.SELL_TP_CD AND SELL_TP_DTL_CD = S1.SELL_TP_DTL_CD AND BASE_PD_CD = S1.PD_CD ) AS AGRG_CT1 /*이월*/ , SUM(S1.AGRG_CT2) AS AGRG_CT2 /*유입*/ , SUM(S1.AGRG_CT3) AS AGRG_CT3 /*해지*/ , SUM(S1.AGRG_CT4) AS AGRG_CT4 /*만료*/ FROM ( SELECT SUBSTR(T1.CH_DTM, 0, 6) AS BASE_YM /*기준년월*/ , T1.SELL_TP_CD /*판매유형*/ , T1.SELL_TP_DTL_CD /*판매유형상세*/ , T1.PD_HCLSF_ID /*상품대분류*/ , T1.PD_MCLSF_ID /*상품중분류*/ , T1.BASE_PD_CD AS PD_CD /*상품코드 - 테이블추가필요*/ , (SELECT PD_NM FROM TB_PDBS_PD_BAS WHERE PD_CD = T1.BASE_PD_CD) AS PD_NM /*상품명*/ /*이월은 따로조회 */ , (CASE WHEN SUBSTR(T1.CNTR_PD_STRTDT,1,6) = SUBSTR(T1.CH_DTM, 1, 6) AND T1.CNTR_DTL_STAT_CD = '101' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS AGRG_CT2 /*유입*/ , (CASE WHEN T1.CNTR_DTL_STAT_CD IN ('301','302','303') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS AGRG_CT3 /*해지*/ , (CASE WHEN T1.CNTR_DTL_STAT_CD IN ('401','402') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS AGRG_CT4 /*만료*/ /*순증, 합계따로계산*/ FROM TB_CBCL_WELLS_CNTR_STAT_CH_BAS T1 /*WELLS계약상태변경기본 - 현재 유효분을 다들고 오려면 계약상세를 들고오는게 맞을꺼 같은데..일단은이렇게*/ WHERE CNTR_NO NOT IN (SELECT CNTR_NO FROM TB_CBCL_WELLS_NOM_ACC_EXCD_BAS WHERE CNTR_NO IS NOT NULL) AND BASE_PD_CD NOT IN (SELECT PD_CD FROM TB_CBCL_WELLS_NOM_ACC_EXCD_BAS WHERE PD_CD IS NOT NULL) AND T1.REL_SN = 1 AND SUBSTR(T1.CH_DTM, 0, 6) BETWEEN #{baseYmFrom} AND #{baseYmTo} AND CNTR_NO NOT IN (SELECT CNTR_NO FROM TB_CBCL_WELLS_NOM_ACC_EXCD_BAS WHERE CNTR_NO IS NOT NULL ) AND BASE_PD_CD NOT IN (SELECT PD_CD FROM TB_CBCL_WELLS_NOM_ACC_EXCD_BAS WHERE PD_CD IS NOT NULL) AND SELL_TP_CD IN ('2','3','6') /*판매유형*/
AND T1.SELL_TP_CD = #{sellTpCd} /*판매유형*/
AND T1.SELL_TP_DTL_CD = #{sellTpDtlCd} /*판매유형상세*/
AND T1.OG_TP_CD = #{ogTpCd} /*소속조직코드*/
AND T1.PD_HCLSF_ID = #{prdtCateHigh} /*상품대분류*/
AND T1.PD_MCLSF_ID = #{prdtCateMid} /*상품중분류*/
) S1 GROUP BY BASE_YM , SELL_TP_CD , SELL_TP_DTL_CD , PD_HCLSF_ID , PD_MCLSF_ID , PD_CD , PD_NM ) ORDER BY SELL_TP_CD, SELL_TP_DTL_CD
